panels.content: This dashboard shows the top tenants based on multiple selection criterias. Rows are collapsed by default to avoid querying all of them. Use the templating variable "limit" above to select the amount of users to be shown.

panels.title: Top $limit users by in-memory series (series created - series removed)

targets.expr:
sum by (user) (
  (
      sum by (user, cluster, namespace) (cortex_ingester_memory_series_created_total{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((ingester.*|cortex|mimir))"} )
      -
      sum by (user, cluster, namespace) (cortex_ingester_memory_series_removed_total{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((ingester.*|cortex|mimir))"} )
  )
  / on(cluster, namespace) group_left
  max by (cluster, namespace) (cortex_distributor_replication_factor{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((distributor|cortex|mimir))"} )
)

and
topk($limit, sum by (user) (
  (
      sum by (user, cluster, namespace) (cortex_ingester_memory_series_created_total{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((ingester.*|cortex|mimir))"} @ end())
      -
      sum by (user, cluster, namespace) (cortex_ingester_memory_series_removed_total{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((ingester.*|cortex|mimir))"} @ end())
  )
  / on(cluster, namespace) group_left
  max by (cluster, namespace) (cortex_distributor_replication_factor{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((distributor|cortex|mimir))"} @ end())
)
 - sum by (user) (
  (
      sum by (user, cluster, namespace) (cortex_ingester_memory_series_created_total{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((ingester.*|cortex|mimir))"} @ start())
      -
      sum by (user, cluster, namespace) (cortex_ingester_memory_series_removed_total{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((ingester.*|cortex|mimir))"} @ start())
  )
  / on(cluster, namespace) group_left
  max by (cluster, namespace) (cortex_distributor_replication_factor{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((distributor|cortex|mimir))"} @ start())
)
)

panels.title: Top $limit users by in-memory series (series created - series removed) that grew the most between query range start and query range end
Top $limit users by received samples rate in last 5m

targets.expr:
sum by (user) (rate(cortex_distributor_received_samples_total{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((distributor|cortex|mimir))"}[$__rate_interval]))
and
topk($limit,
  sum by (user) (rate(cortex_distributor_received_samples_total{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((distributor|cortex|mimir))"}[$__rate_interval] @ end()))
  -
  sum by (user) (rate(cortex_distributor_received_samples_total{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((distributor|cortex|mimir))"}[$__rate_interval] @ start()))
)

panels.title: Top $limit users by received samples rate that grew the most between query range start and query range end
Top $limit users by discarded samples rate in last 5m

targets.expr:
sum by (user) (rate(cortex_discarded_samples_total{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((ingester.*|cortex|mimir)|(distributor|cortex|mimir))"}[$__rate_interval]))
and
topk($limit,
  sum by (user) (rate(cortex_discarded_samples_total{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((ingester.*|cortex|mimir)|(distributor|cortex|mimir))"}[$__rate_interval] @ end()))
  -
  sum by (user) (rate(cortex_discarded_samples_total{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((ingester.*|cortex|mimir)|(distributor|cortex|mimir))"}[$__rate_interval] @ start()))
)

panels.title: Top $limit users by discarded samples rate that grew the most between query range start and query range end
Top $limit users by series with exemplars
